thread.title: Jaromir Jagr is growing his mullet again
thread.title_full: Jaromir Jagr is growing his mullet again

author: James Dator
title: Jaromir Jagr is growing his mullet again
text:
Jaromir Jagr is growing his mullet again SB Nation 2 hrs ago James Dator
BREAKING FASHION NEWS: . @68Jagr says he's growing his hair, bringing back the mullet. 'I have to.' #FlaPanthers pic.twitter.com/hkMhbG7b40
AdChoices — George Richards (@GeorgeRichards) October 5, 2015
YES! This is the most important NHL news of the year, neigh the entire season. Like, we didn't need a ton of reasons to be excited about hockey this year but JAGR'S MULLET IS BACK!!! Gosh it's so exciting. This is a challenge to you, people of Florida. The Panthers have had terrible attendance for a while. Now you have the option to see JAGR MULLET live and in-person. It's a privilege most of us would kill for. Do not squander it.
In case you need more convincing we have an artist's interpretation of how awesome it will be.
